AI Description: r-gridextra is an R package that provides a set of functions to enhance and extend the grid graphics system in R, allowing for more flexibility and customizability in creating and arranging plots.
Core Features: Offers Additional Functionality & Customization Options For Grid-Based Plots In R, Enables Easy Creation Of Complex Multi-Plot Layouts & Annotations, Supports The Arrangement Of Plots In Grids With Different Configurations, Facilitates The Addition Of Custom Grobs & Decorations To Plots
General Tags: R Package, Data Visualization, Plotting, Grid Graphics
